price: O die ihr glaubt, fürchtet Allah in gebührender Furcht und sterbt ja nicht anders denn als (Allah) Ergebene!
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ تُقَاتِهِۦ وَلَا تَمُوتُنَّ إِلَّا وَأَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha ḥaqqa tuqātihi walā tamūtunna illā wa-antum mus'limūna
